citations.narrative:
Recently an employee sustained a bite injury from a coatimundi at the facility. Upon a discussion with personnel it was
determined that facility procedures had not been followed and the employee entered the enclosure without securing the
animal in the lock out. It was noted that the employee had been previously trained in the correct safety procedures.
Entering an enclosure with an animal could cause it to bite due to being stressed. Animals must be handled in such a
manner so as to minimize distress. The facility conducted retraining of employees on safety procedures, and only
authorized personnel will tend to certain species of animals in an effort to handle the animals in the least stressful manner
possible.
******Corrected at the time of inspection (6/22/23)
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.131(b)(1) 
   
Handling of animals. 
Recently an employee sustained a bite injury from a coatimundi at the facility. Upon a discussion with personnel it was 
determined that facility procedures had not been followed and the employee entered the enclosure without securing the 
animal in the lock out. It was noted that the employee had been previously trained in the correct safety procedures.  
Entering an enclosure with an animal could cause it to bite due to being stressed. Animals must be handled in such a 
manner so as to minimize distress. The facility conducted retraining of employees on safety procedures, and only 
authorized personnel will tend to certain species of animals in an effort to handle the animals in the least stressful manner 
possible. 
******Corrected at the time of inspection (6/22/23) 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
